file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-20-84-06 - WING ROOT SECTION BETWEEN SPAR II AND SPAR III - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL WING ROOT SECTION BETWEEN SPAR II AND SPAR III - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of the wing root section for general condition. B. Related Zones: 532/632. C. Zone Boundaries: STA YA = - 960.00 thru STA YA = - 3815.00 (rib 9). D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY WING - EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL IN- ALL 05-20-84-200-801-A ♦ SPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-20-84 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-20-84-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. WING - EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do Zonal Task 57-Z532-213-001-A00. (2) The external general visual inspection (GVI) of zones 532/632 must be done within a touching distance of the items examined. (3) It is a GVI to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be seen easily. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Stand To get access to the inspection area D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Wing H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the ladder in position. I. Wing - External General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the wing zone for loose screws, nicks, cracks, dents, erosion, corrosion, deformation, deteriorated protective treatment and sealant condition (Figure 602). (2) Examine the lower skin access holes for condition. (3) Examine the upper skin/spars attachment for condition. (4) Examine the web and stiffeners for condition. (5) Examine the web cut-outs of spar 3 for condition. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-84 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (6) Examine the spar 3/wing attachment for condition. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-84 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
